function.name: api_ssl_get_client_unpaid_invoices
function.desc:
This Function Applies to the SSL Certificates services.
This function returns a list of all the unpaid invoices matching the module passed..

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

output.name: invoices_id
output.description: ID of the Invoice used for referencing

output.name: invoices_description
output.description: Description of what the Invoice was for

output.name: invoices_custid
output.description: ID of the Customer this Invoice is for

output.name: invoices_type
output.description: The Type of Invoice (1 = charge, 10+ are payment types)

output.name: invoices_group
output.description: Billing Group the Invoice falls under, Not currently used

output.name: invoices_extra
output.description: If type 1 invoice this points to the repeat invoice id, otherwise points to the id of the charge invoice its a payment for.

output.name: invoices_paid
output.description: Wether or not the Invoice was paid (if applicable)

output.name: invoices_module
output.description: Module the Invoice was for.  You can use [get_modules](#get-modules) to get a list of available modules.

output.name: invoices_service
output.description: ID of the Service/Order this Invoice is for such as 1000 if the order was vps1000 and the module was vps

input_comment: * @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
